login.welcome: Please log in to work in the system

settings.passlen: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

signup.name: Name
signup.tellyourcode: Let us know your sign-up code, please.
signup.tellyourname: Let us know your name, please. No more than 30 characters.
signup.tellyourlastname: Let us know your surname, please. No more than 30 characters.
signup.cannotcheckemail: E-mail verification failure, further registration is impossible. Try later.
signup.emailinuse: E-mail is already taken by another user.
signup.incorrectpassformat: Password must be 8-32 characters long, consisting at least one number from  0-9, small and capital letters of the latin alphabet.
signup.difpasswords: Must coincide with the passwordin previous field.
signup.error: Registration failure, try later. Probably you are already registered.
